com.scheid.jsondiff.service.compare.component

Class ContentCompare

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scheid.jsondiff.service.compare.DefaultCompare
      • com.scheid.jsondiff.service.compare.component.SizeCompare
        • com.scheid.jsondiff.service.compare.component.ContentCompare
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JsonDiffCompare

    @Component
 @Profile(value="content")
public class ContentCompare
extends SizeCompare
    Content difference implementation for sets of base64 encoded jsons. Will only execute its logic if SizeCompare can't identify a difference. Will only be used if the 'content' profile is active. Uses the Maps implementation from Guava for json map comparison, parsing the MapDifference result
